sentences.en: But Mr Fenty's brusque style has alienated many of his constituents.
sentences.cn: 但是芬提莽撞的风格疏远了很多选民.

sentences.en: Eleanor was brusque and firm and businesslike.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺态度粗暴,意志坚定、办事认真.

sentences.en: Explain as little as possible without being brusque.
He was criticised from the outset as being brusque and confrontational.
sentences.cn: 一开始,人们批评他态度粗鲁,不好说话.

sentences.en: Her brusque manner concealed a caring nature.
sentences.cn: 她举止粗鲁但实际上很关心他人.

sentences.en: His manner seemed easier and, while still not friendly, was certainly less brusque and not aggressive.
sentences.cn: 他的态度似乎也平易了些, 尽管仍然算不上友好, 但肯定不那么唐突无理,气势汹汹了.

sentences.en: His manner was self-assured and brusque.
I thought him more sensitive and gentle than his occasionally brusque manner suggested.
sentences.cn: 他有时态度粗暴,但我认为他还是较为机灵和文雅的.

sentences.en: She was businesslike and brusque, with no small talk.
sentences.cn: 她公事公办,不讲絮话,但有时话语唐突.

sentences.en: She was offended by his brusque reply.
sentences.cn: 他那种粗暴的回答使她听了很不舒服.

sentences.en: Some customers are not ratIT brusque and don't seem to like conversation.
sentences.cn: 有些顾客相当粗鲁,也不愿多说话.

sentences.en: The doctor spoke in a brusque tone.
sentences.cn: 医生不客气地简单说了几个字。

sentences.en: The doctors are brusque and busy .
sentences.cn: 医生们说话简短生硬，十分忙碌。

sentences.en: The doctors are brusque and busy.
sentences.cn: 医生们十分忙碌，说话简短生硬。

sentences.en: Try to cultivate a less brusque manner.
sentences.cn: 尽量去培养不那么粗暴的举止.

trans.tran_cn: 粗鲁的，莽撞的，唐突，疾言厉色
trans.tran_en: using very few words, in a way that seems rude
